Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: Oh! I've read about this tradition... it's a 'birthday gift', isn't it?#$b#So, is it part of the tradition to give out rubbish like this?
Entries.GreenRain: I can't see the colour green very well.#$b#I guess it's part of living underground for so long.
Entries.Tue: Ah... cave carrot stew, cave carrot roast, cave carrot soup and cave carrots au gratin.#$e#...And a ramekin of cave carrot brûlée to sweeten the night.#$e#What?
Entries.firstVisit_Caldera: You found the legendary Dwarfish Forge? Incredible... I've never seen it, myself.#$e#The machinery is so old, none of my people understand how it works. But it's definitely Dwarfish technology.
